orientationSubtitle: The puzzle works better in landscape mode
passwordHint: If you purchased the Pro version, you received the password by email
cipherHint: Each symbol corresponds to one letter. Some letters are already revealed as hints. Find the pattern and figure out the rest!
pdfSubtitle: Download the bonus puzzle PDF file
footer: This site does not collect personal data.
privacyText: This site is designed specifically for the interactive part of Codyssey puzzles. Everything here is simple and safe — no personal data is collected and no tracking occurs. All printable materials available for download are stored in encrypted form.
puzzle_testCipher_subtitle: Discover the World Through Secret Codes
comingSoon_subtitle: A new category is coming soon
aboutText: Codyssey is an educational project designed to turn learning into discovery. We create themed puzzles that give children the opportunity to independently crack ciphers, uncover interesting facts, and learn through play. Each card is not just information — it's a little adventure. The project is designed for entire classrooms — we believe every student will feel engaged and experience the joy of victory. The interactive part of this site allows children to check their solved codes and continue their discovery in the digital space as well. Codyssey combines logic, creativity, and the joy of learning — because the most valuable knowledge is the kind a child discovers on their own.
contactText: Have a question, feedback, or an idea? Want personalized puzzles for your classroom? Or spotted an error in one of our puzzles? We'd love to hear from you — drop us a line and we'll be sure to get back to you.
geographySubtitle: Choose a country and decode the secret message
geo_soon_subtitle: A new country is coming soon
